import Layout from '../components/Layout'; import MyGrid from '../components/MyGrid'; import {Form, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; const options = [ { key: 'o', text: '', value: '' }, { key: 'm', text: 'Male', value: 'male' }, { key: 'f', text: 'Female', value: 'female' }, ] export default function About() { return (

Program: 3-week board and train

 ); }
